message:
In this article, the author said:
"Do not worry about hype. Keep doing your thing, keep learning what you were learning, and move on. Pay attention to it only if you have a genuine interest, or if you feel that it could bring you some benefit in the medium or long run."
Does this mean I should continue with my plan? Whatever I planned to learn in the coming few months?
story: ‎أحمد محمود محمد عبدالوهاب‎ shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Being A Developer After 40 — Free Code Camp
caption: medium.freecodecamp.com
description: (This is the talk I have given at App Builders Switzerland on April 25th, 2016. The slides are available on SpeakerDeck …

data.message:
هو انا الصراحة شايف ان السؤال انت الوحيد اللى تقدر تاخد القرار 
السؤال لو انت حابب ال game development ومستمتع بيه جدا وعاوز تتعلم اكتر وتنفذ كام لعبة فى دماغك هنفترض انها صغيره هل هتكمل ولا هتقول مش بتاكل عيش فى مصر ؟؟
